name: thecoffeemann
text: I go here once a week every week for some time now. The food is good and staff are nice. Its priced very well. If you get the cinnamon sticks microwave the icing container (remove foil lid) for 20 seconds and stir and pour over. Works well that way. Ask for free plates and napkins so dinner cleanup is a breeze.

text: Luv their pizza!

text: Waited 2 hours and then I got upset and they wouldn't deliver my food. Horrible service and Matt is a sorry excuse for a manager.

name: Aaron Ace
text: They gave me a steak cheese calzone with no steak just mushroom. Worst hungrey howies I been too. Luckily for them I hit the road with my half made food and ended up getting Burger King cause I was to far to return. Horrible!!! Paid $12 for mushroom and bread

name: Mikel Sinclair
text: Pizza is pretty tasty.. this post is for the delivery drivers.  They  only make 2 dollar in pay per delivery.  If the are lucky enough to get 4 delivery in an hour. That's $8. In an hour. Plus burning there gas to bring you dinner. They ‚Ä¶More

text: Good flavor crust pizza. Got double cheese pepperoni and Ham on thin crust very good.

name: derek cook
text: No better than Little Caesars Pizza at a more expensive price. the only one in the franchise I've ever met that does not accept most of the promo coupons from corporate. All their deals are a dollar more than every other hungry Howie's I've ever used in my entire life.not worth the extra money

name: Tony Stitt
text: A salad and Howie Bread is a Wonderful combination

name: Darren Rinaldi
text: I placed my order at 3:29 for a 5:05 pickup. They didn't even out the pizzas in until I showed up at exactly 5:05, then had to wait until 5:30 for my order. If you are placing a pick up order give them a 30 minute lead, so if you want it at 5 then tell them you want it at 4:30. So angry and disappointed.

name: Carpet Cheeto
text:
Never had any issues personally. Good pizza.
Earlier today, though, I had a calzone delivered, and the delivery guy turned around and left before I could even offer a proper tip. I feel bad now. Sorry, pizza fellow.

text: I would give no stars if possible. I have repeatedly had poor and slow service here. They can never seem to make the right order and management never apologizes for their repetitive mistakes. There‚Äôs always plenty of workers in there. I don‚Äôt understand how they can‚Äôt get it right.

text: I have had three consecutive problems with this Hungry Howie‚Äôs pizza. They have messed up all three orders. When I called back the manager didn‚Äôt even apologize and tried to laugh it off. Very disappointed will not be going back.

name: Jeremy Hyland
text: We order from this location all the time it's close to home and good value. Sometimes they aren't always good with the consistency but when they are on their game they are great! Thank you!

name: Devon Perry
text: First pizza eaten from this store. It was fantastic, inexpensive and the customer service was great. Needless to say, I'll be back :)

name: Grace O
text: Maybe it's just my local location but I avoid going in as much as possible. Place is a mess to no fault of the staff. Just falling apart a bit. Only ever ordered pizza, which is a little overpriced for the quality but probably the best bang for your buck in town. Anything with cheese is good in my book.

text: Ordered 2 pizza's and cheese bread at 7:15 pm for delivery. Finally got COLD/OLD pizza at 9pm. Called and told them the pizza was cold and they didn't care. We'll be ordering from Zano's from now on. Always fast and HOT/FRESH

If I owned or managed this business I would be ashamed.
